column2: an A.M. Eatery////Amazing place. Pancakes were the best i ever had. This will be my new brunch spot/breakfast spot/ take people there from out of town spot/ this is a place Im in love with at my very first bite!!!!! Lets just say....the pancakes were so good
column3: I wanted some alone time with them!!!!! Seriously!!!! Our waiter was the best!!!!
